replies.author: wjwrh
replies.txt_content:
可能是residence插件的限制
你(如果装了residence的话，当然看你的描述大概率是residence的限制)
打开plugins/residence/config.yml
找到这一段
    Place:
      # Level from which one to start block lava and water place
      # This don't have effect in residence area
      Level: 63
      # With this set to true, playrs cant place lava outside residence
      NoLavaPlace: false
      # With this set to true, playrs cant place water outside residence
      NoWaterPlace: false
      Worlds:
      - world复制代码

把上面那个nolavaplace和nowaterplace都设为false

replies.author: minecraft12581
replies.txt_content: 能发个截图我看看是什么情况吗？
